variants.Description in input context: The A30P mutation leads to a change from alanine (A) to proline (P) at position 30 of the α-synuclein protein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using a mouse model expressing human mutant A30P α-synuclein.

Readout description.Result Description: Reversibly reduced levels of dopamine and metabolites in the olfactory bulb, suggesting an impact of A30P α-syn on olfactory neurotransmitter content.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple biological replicates were performed to assess the effects of mutant A30P α-syn expression.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cells were used as a positive control to assess normal function.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control to assess background levels of dopamine and metabolites.
